summary:
In 1585, Sir Walter Raleigh tried to establish the first English settlement in North America on Roanoke Island. The colony struggled with supply issues and conflicts with Native Americans. When a ship returned in 1590, the colonists were missing, leaving only the word "CROATOAN" as a clue.

Despite searches, the colonists' fate is still a mystery. Some think they joined nearby Native American tribes, while others believe they were attacked. The story of the "Lost Colony" captured people's interest, especially after an author wrote about it in 1834, making the colonists famous.
title: Roanoke Colony
